name: Keep The Change (KTC)
description:
ADVICE: The game is not finished. It doesn't have a goal yet. Expect this as a preview of what the final game will be. 

Hello everyone, this is what we were able to put together with my team in these two weeks. 
The project ended up being very big for the time of the Jam, but we are happy with the progress we made and the experienced gained. Our idea is to continue the development of the game!

We hope you like the first "prototype". :3

For now you can browse the first map, collect some items and craft a recipe in the shop. Although it's not to much, we didn't want to miss the opportunity to present our progress. 

In the future, it will be possible to collect various itema from aroun the world, and craft several recipes, encounter with different challenges and most important, a system of buying/selling and maintenance of the store will be implemented to give the player a goal. 

Any criticism/recommendation is welcome. 

We hope you enjoy it and we are keeping you up to date with the latest news. 

If you are interested in the project and want to join the team please contact us! 


Team
